verbose_text: Moreover, chloroquine, which activated ATM protein, promoted intracellular total cholesterol accumulation, while the class III PI3K inhibitor, LY290042 and 3-MA, inhibited this effect, suggesting that class III PI3K protein plays an important role in the ATM protein mediated endocytosis of E - / B 48 lipoproteins in the hepatocytes of ApoE -/- mice.
evidence: chloroquine, which activated ATM protein, promoted intracellular total cholesterol
